channel.title: Why is Fat Cookies partial moderator?
channel.description:
First off, I'm posting this here because I don't want to PM anyone here or on the IRC, and this is the closest I can get to a public post for 'only' mods to see.
I don't have anything against Fat Cookies, but I don't see why he was chosen to moderate the client hacking boards. For all I know, he could've been reporting dozens of posts from the section, but as you can see, I'm unable to... see... that. I haven't seen him that active lately, nor post something helpful community. He just seems like a regular senior member, and you might as well just pick someone else who's been here since 2007-2008.
Anyways, fill me in.
~Lin

item.title: Why is Fat Cookies partial moderator?
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

If a member was made moderator, they were not made so lightly.

Read full topic
item.source: Why is Fat Cookies partial moderator?

item.title: Why is Fat Cookies partial moderator?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

He was given the position because the staff found him suitable.

I think that sums it up.

Read full topic
item.source: Why is Fat Cookies partial moderator?
